column5: Clean guest bedroom available. Private room & guest bathroom with full shower/tub combo. Walk in closet & dresser for guest use. Gated community. Free wifi. Close to Hardy Toll & I45. 10 minutes from Woodlands Waterway dining and shopping. 30 minutes from Galleria and downtown areas.
column8: Ideal location by IAH & Woodlands- Superbowl 2017!
